item.title: Welcome to R
item.description: Introduction Welcome to R! R is great tool for data analysis. Over the years, the language has seen a lot of growth, and it is now one of the two most common languages used for machine learning (the other being Python). R can be used for econometrics, geospatial analysis (it does not yet have the capabilities of full fledged GIS programs yet, but the capabilities are growing), machine learning, data visualization, text-mining and advanced statistics, among others.
